i1.blurb: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Azir''' places a marker above the ruins of all destroyed [[turret]]s outside the enemy base.

{{sbc|Disc of the Sun:}} '''Azir''' raises the {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} from the selected marked ruins after a brief delay. The {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} functions like a standard turret but gains {{as|(15% AP)}} {{sti|ad|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}. It also grants '''Azir''' any {{g|gold}} it earns. The {{as|Sun Disc's|buzzword2}} {{sti|{{as|health}}}} decays over 60 seconds and loses {{sti|armor|{{as|100 armor}}}} if '''Azir''' dies or moves {{tt|too far|2000 units}} away.
i1.name: Shurima's Legacy
notes: * In {{tip|Ascension}}, '''Azir''' can summon a {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} in the center of the map provided the {{ci|Xerath|Ancient Ascended}} is dead.
** The {{as|Sun Disc|buzzword2}} will be destroyed if the ''Ancient Ascended'' respawns while active.

q1.blurb: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' orders all {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} to dash toward the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies they pass through and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 25% for 1 second.
Enemies hit by multiple soldiers do not take additional damage, but are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by an additional 25% per soldier beyond the first.
q1.name: Conquering Sands
notes: * The {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} will stop when encountering {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}} during the charge.

w1.blurb: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Azir''' stores a {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}} periodically, up to a maximum of 2 stored at once. He also gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, doubled for 5 seconds if he summons a third concurrent soldier.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' [[Champion summoned units|summons]] an {{tip|untargetable}} {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}} at the target location that lasts 10 seconds, expiring twice as fast while within range of an enemy {{tip|turret}}, and expiring instantly if '''Azir''' is not in control range.

When '''Azir''' attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} attacks in his stead, dealing {{pp|18|60|62|64|66|68|70|72|75|80|85|90|100|110|120|130|140|150|160|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in a line. Multiple soldiers can strike the same target, with each soldier beyond the first dealing 25% damage. '''Azir''' can only command soldiers when near them. Secondary targets hit take {{pp|4|key=%|25 to 100|1 to 16}} damage.
{{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}} cannot attack enemy structures, wards, trinkets and traps.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 60}}%|Increased Attack Speed|{{ap|20*2 to 60*2}}%}}
w1.name: Arise!
notes: ** In {{tip|ARAM}}, '''Azir''' will start the game with one point already in ''Arise!'' with only two points to allocate to other abilities.
* '''Azir''' cannot cast {{ai|Conquering Sands|Azir}} or {{ai|Shifting Sands|Azir}} without summoning a {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}} first.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single attack of the soliders.

e1.blurb: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' {{tip|shield|shields}} himself for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and {{tip|dashes}} to one of his {{as|Sand Soldiers|buzzword2}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies he passes through.
If '''Azir''' hits an enemy champion, he stops moving and gains a charge of {{ai|Arise!|Azir}}.
leveling: {{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}}}}{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Shifting Sands
notes: * If '''Azir''' casts ''Shifting Sands'' on a {{as|Sand Soldier|buzzword2}} moving from {{ai|Conquering Sands|Azir}}, '''Azir''' will follow the soldier all the way.

r1.blurb: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Azir''' calls forth a phalanx of soldiers from behind him, charging forward in the target direction.
Enemies impacted by the charge are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}.
When the soldiers finish their charge, they stand as a wall for 3 seconds, acting as impassible terrain for enemies. Allies and '''Azir''' can freely pass through the wall.
r1.name: Emperor's Divide
notes: * The charge begins slightly behind '''Azir''', making it easier to set up ''Emperor's Divide'' with {{ai|Shifting Sands|Azir}}.
** The soldiers will stop charging when encountering {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

* The wall '''will''' count as terrain for the purposes of 'into terrain' effects ({{ai|Condemn|Vayne}}, {{ai|Dredge Line|Nautilus}}, etc.) This will only affect enemies, allies will pass through the wall in all circumstances, even if knocked into it by an enemy.
